component.name: PosterGridExample
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundURI = "pkg:/images/rsgde_bg_hd.jpg"
m.top.setFocus(true)
m.postergrid = m.top.findNode("examplePosterGrid")
m.postergrid.translation = [ 130, 160 ]
m.readPosterGridTask = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentReader") m.readPosterGridTask.contenturi = "http://www.sdktestinglab.com/Tutorial/content/rendergridps.xml" m.readPosterGridTask.observeField("content", "showpostergrid") m.readPosterGridTask.control = "RUN" end sub
sub showpostergrid() m.postergrid.content = m.readPosterGridTask.content end sub
